body_html:
@ebrevdo To me, you're just saying you will probably look at this back again in the future, but can't predict when! ;P

If you can confirm this, I will try and make docker installation simpler than pip. Would this work for you? If it is possible, I can probably and will eventually do it! :)

(Just not with GPU support, of course, but that's beyond the point)

PS: Never heard of PTAL before, google didn't help much. :)
body_text:

body:
@ebrevdo [To me](http://talk.cregox.com/t/my-social-unfair-undervaluation-and-why-the-financial-system-is-broken/7751?u=cregox), you're just saying you will probably look at this back again in the future, but can't predict when! ;P

If you can confirm this, I will try and make docker installation simpler than pip. Would this work for you? If it is possible, I can probably and will eventually do it! :)

(Just not with GPU support, of course, but that's beyond the point)

PS: Never heard of [PTAL](http://www.acronymfinder.com/PTAL.html) before, google didn't help _much_. :)
